selections.name: Walk Like A Man
selections.reason: Top rated (Speed 90, Class 91). Consistent performer who finished 2nd at this track last start. Looks the one to beat in this field.

selections.name: Belgrano
selections.reason: Strong speed figure (88) and good recent form (2nd last start). Main threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Don's Party
selections.reason: Consistent type (Speed 76). Finished 3rd last start and maps well here.

selections.name: Meritage
selections.reason: Best of the rest. Draws well in barrier 2 but needs to improve on speed figures (70).

danger_horse.name: Belgrano
danger_horse.reason: Has the speed figures to challenge if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Mr Fabulous
selections.reason: Excellent value play. High speed rating (111) and proven at this staying trip (2nd here last start). Overlooked by market.

selections.name: Winning Point
selections.reason: Very consistent mare with elite speed figures (110). Maps well and will be in the finish.

selections.name: Malbork Castle
selections.reason: Highest rated runner (Speed 113) but carries top weight. Must be respected on class.

selections.name: Dezignation
selections.reason: Last start winner stepping up in grade. Good form but tougher here.

danger_horse.name: Winning Point
danger_horse.reason: Consistent high rater who rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Manukau
selections.reason: Class above this field (Class 93). Godolphin runner with solid form (2nd last start). Draws the rail and should dominate.

selections.name: Zing To Me
selections.reason: The clear danger on ratings (Speed 73). Snowden stable runner who will be competitive.

selections.name: Over The Limit
selections.reason: Solid speed figure (71) and draws well. Place chance.

selections.name: Plume
selections.reason: Hawkes/Schiller combination commands respect despite lower speed figures.

danger_horse.name: Zing To Me
danger_horse.reason: Only other runner with comparable speed figures to the favorite.

selections.name: Cuban Rain
selections.reason: Consistent type with strong speed (90) and class (91) figures. Represents value against a vulnerable favorite.

selections.name: Bondasong
selections.reason: Last start winner but speed figure (59) is surprisingly low. Respect winning form but risky at short odds.

selections.name: Firework
selections.reason: Winner last start with decent figures (73). In the mix.

selections.name: Aisle Two
selections.reason: Consistent (Speed 74) and draws the inside gate.

danger_horse.name: Bondasong
danger_horse.reason: Favorite who knows how to win, despite lower speed ratings.

selections.name: Tahurangi
selections.reason: Massive outlier on ratings (Speed 110). If this figure is accurate, she destroys this field. Huge value play.

selections.name: Zougotme
selections.reason: Strong speed figure (90) and good recent form (3rd). The logical danger.

selections.name: Cosmic Avenger
selections.reason: Solid speed (83) and draws well. Competitive.

selections.name: Sunday Punch
selections.reason: Favorite but rates poorly (Speed 42). Vulnerable and worth taking on.

danger_horse.name: Zougotme
danger_horse.reason: Reliable alternative if the top pick fails to fire.

selections.name: Inoue
selections.reason: Elite speed figure (113) and class rating (106). Snowden/McMurray team. The class runner of the field.

selections.name: Can't Touch This
selections.reason: Huge speed rating (112) last start. Genuine threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Turned Down
selections.reason: Strong speed (103) and draws well. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Octa De Lago
selections.reason: Last start winner but figures (86) are below the top three here.

danger_horse.name: Can't Touch This
danger_horse.reason: Speed figures suggest a two-horse race between #1 and #6.
